name: Insomnia (itch) (jthedev)
description:
Instructions:

Z- switch between day and night

Hold the left mouse button and drag to draw a path

During the day....

night - all the sleepers sleep walk indiscriminantly

day - the trail drawn disintegrates

How will you balance these two?

Guide the sleepers to the houses, without falling down too far

There are 7 levels to beat in the game, goodluck
